title: Unassisted photoelectrochemical hydrogen peroxide production over MoOx-supported Mo on a Cu3BiS3 photocathode
content:
Energy Environ. Sci., 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D4EE00741G, Paper
Subin Moon, Young Sun Park, Hyungsoo Lee, Wooyong Jeong, Eunji Kwon, Jeongyoub Lee, Juwon Yun, Soobin Lee, Jun Hwan Kim, Seungho Yu, Jooho Moon
MoOx-supported Mo enhances peroxide adsorption strength and electron transport, enhancing H2O2 production efficiency in Cu3BiS3-based photocathode. Finally, unbiased PECâ€“PEC system coupled with perovskite photoanode shows efficient H2O2 production.
